author: siddhesh86
body:
Added mixing scenaring AVE_250_BX_25ns and AVE_300_BX_25ns for PU250, PU300 in Configuration/StandardSequences/python/Mixing.py. It is needed to produce SingleNeutrino samples in McM (Monte-Carlo Manager) system with CMSSW_9_3_7. I am a request manager in PdmV. Please approve the pull request so that I can produce the samples centrally asap. I have tested the modifications locally.
Thank you.
title: Cmssw 9 3 x
